description: This beautiful autumn flame red maple tree (Acer rubrum 'Autumn Flame') is a show-stopping centerpiece in any landscape. In autumn, its foliage turns vibrant shades of red, orange, and yellow. It’s perfect for providing backdrop to your outdoor spaces with its colorful foliage, and its height and spread, reaching up to 50 feet high and 45 feet wide. The tree also bears small red flowers in spring, adding beauty all year long. Durable and versatile, this tree can withstand strong winds, drought, and air pollution, making it perfect for almost any environment. Its root system is shallow, so it’s easy to maintain and great for tight spaces. Its beauty, resilience, and elegant spread make the autumn flame red maple tree an amazing addition to any yard.
